description: With the Summoner Test War out of the way for the foreseeable future, an outing to the movies with Himeji and Minami leads Akihisa to a surprising find - a love letter!

titles.title: Despesas Da Comida, Encontro E Armas!
Food Budget, Dates, and Stun Guns
Shokuhi to Date to Stun Gun
食費とデートとスタンガン
